Sludge/Artemis

Slugde walked slowly where the ship was, with every step th=
at he did it seemed that every around tembled.

Artemis opened her comm lin=
k to Pacifix and said "Unit Artemis is in the place with some of us!!!!"
  =
----- Original Message ----- 
  From: gunthers8@... 
  To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, May 21, 2001 10:59 PM
  Subject: Re: The A=
utobot Council


  ::JetV/Crotale::
  JetV hears the comm from PAcifix and =
replies.
  "PAcifix the ship is through preliminary checks and is ready for=
 take
  off.  I am here with a couple others that have arrived."

  Crotale=
 sits silently in a weapon container on the ship.
  --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rA=
uq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
  > OOC: Well.... I'm going away again, but not for =
camping. This time
  > I am leaving to participate in a national level musi=
c competition. I'll
  > be gone from wednesday (23) till late sunday (27th)=
 night.
  >
  > Jer will be posting for my Decepticons, Gunthers can cover =
my
  > Chivitrons. I'm not sure what will happen to the Autobots for a whil=
e.
  >
  > --- Pacifix / Crossroads / Swoop / Ikoto ---
  >
  > Pacifix nod=
s to Ironhide, and exits the Council room, knowing that
  > the meeting was=
 adjourned. Pacifix walked outside, and stretched
  > knowing that this wou=
ld be his last day on the planet he had called
  > home for so many years. =
"Ok." He opened an encrypted commlink
  > to all Autobots who were going on=
 the mission. (Crossroads, JetV,
  > Artemis, Gold bug, Jazz, Metalwarhawk,=
 Technobots, Hoist -- the
  > 'old friend' that Ironhide sent, Trailblazer,=
 Grimlock, Swoop, Slag,
  > Snarl, Sludge, and any other Autobots that I ha=
ven't mentioned)
  > "All Autobots that are going to participate in this cr=
uitial mission of
  > secrecy, please report to the hidden Autobots shuttle=
, and wait
  > there for me to arrive. Pacifix out." Pacifix transforms int=
o APC
  > mode and heads out towards his quarters to collect his stuff.
  >=

  > Swoop transforms into pterodactyl mode, and flies out towards the
  > =
launch site.
  >
  > Crossroads gets the message while he was approaching t=
he
  > launch site for the ship. He aririve at the entrance, and hops into =
it,
  > appearing at the bottom. He walks around the ship, finds a crate to=

  > site on, moves it to the large open area which Pacifix would
  > proba=
bly use for his farwell speech. He sits down on the crate
  > waiting for P=
acifix.
  >
  >
  >
  > On 18 May 2001, at 8:08, robertdahl wrote:
  >
  > =
> Ironhide frowned at how this had degenerated. But he knew everyone in
  >=
 > the council would be happy to see the Dinobots leave. He looked down
  >=
 > at Pacifix, "I also want to send an old friend of mine" he said. "Take
 =
 > > the Technobots as well, they have always wanted to go and explore
  > =
> other planets, and their technology will be of great help" he said
  > > =
looking down at Pacifix.
  > >
  > >

is subject to
